directions.step:
:
1. DISSOLVE GELATIN IN BOILING WATER.
2. USE COLD WATER; STIR TO MIX WELL.
3. POUR ABOUT 1 GAL INTO EACH PAN. CHILL UNTIL SLIGHTLY THICKENED.
4. USE 15 LB BANANAS A.P. (37 BANANAS). ADD AN EQUAL QUANTITY OF PEELED AND THINLY SLICED BANANAS TO GELATIN IN EACH PAN.
5. FOLD AN EQUAL QUANTITY OF FRUIT INTO GELATIN IN EACH PAN. CHILL UNTIL FIRM.
Recipe Number: J00701
SERVING SIZE: 2/3 CUP
